page.title: 11HANNINGTON HALL,HANNINGTON
page.content: Hannington Hall is owned by Mr. and Mrs. Hussey-Freke,who have lived there for twenty-eight years.The previous owner was Mr.B.Fry. The Hall was built in 1653 and has twenty rooms.The biggest room in the Hall is the French drawing room,which is decorated in gold and white and has several mirrors and paintings.The smallest room is the Powder room,which adjoins both the dining room and lounge.The Hall alone covers three hundred and fifty square feet,while the Hall and land combined cover three hundred and forty acres.Most of the land is either garden,grazing land for cows,or woodland.The woodland is mostly deciduous.The family also keep one cat and two peacocks.
